content:
# FACTORIO REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at Position(-11.5, 69.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position(-11.5, 69.5) - operational, working status
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 71.5) - operational, working status with coal fuel
- Steam engine at position(-0.5, 75.5) - operational, working status
- Connected by pipe groups for water and steam
The system is now operational after being refueled with coal.

### Electricity Network
Consists of:
- Small electric poles connecting the steam engine to the mining drills and assembling machine
- Expanded power network with poles at positions (4.5, 77.5), (8.5, 77.5), (12.5, 77.5), (16.5, 77.5), (20.5, 77.5), (24.5, 77.5), (28.5, 77.5), (28.5, 81.5), (33.5, 96.5), and many more
- Additional poles placed at (35.5, 99.5), (28.5, 99.5), (24.5, 99.5), (24.5, 95.5), (24.5, 91.5), (24.5, 87.5), (24.5, 83.5), (24.5, 79.5), (20.5, 79.5), (16.5, 79.5), (12.5, 79.5), (8.5, 79.5), (4.5, 79.5), (0.5, 79.5), and (-0.5, 79.5)
- Further expanded with poles at (35.5, 96.5), (24.5, 96.5), (20.5, 96.5), (16.5, 96.5), (12.5, 96.5), (8.5, 96.5), (4.5, 96.5), (0.5, 96.5), (-0.5, 96.5), (-0.5, 92.5), (-0.5, 88.5), (-0.5, 84.5), and (-0.5, 80.5)
- Electricity group with ID 7402 spanning from the steam engine to the production areas
The power network is now operational with the boiler being refueled.

### Iron Mining Operation at Position(27.5, 85.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill 1 at position(27.5, 85.5) - operational but waiting for space in destination
- Electric mining drill 2 at position(30.5, 85.5) - operational but waiting for space in destination
- Small electric pole at position(29.5, 83.5)
- Both drills are positioned over iron ore resources (approximately 250,000 iron ore each).

### Iron Smelting Area at Position(28.0, 88.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace 1 at position(28.0, 88.0) - operational, working status with iron ore (94) and iron plates (43) in output
- Stone furnace 2 at position(31.0, 88.0) - operational, working status with iron ore (94)
- Burner inserter 1 at position(28.5, 89.5) - not visible in latest data
- Burner inserter 2 at position(31.5, 89.5) - waiting for source items, has coal fuel (3)
- Wooden chest 1 at position(28.5, 90.5) - empty
- Wooden chest 2 at position(31.5, 90.5) - storing iron plates (13)
- Burner inserter at position(27.5, 90.5) - waiting for source items, has coal fuel (4)
- Burner inserter at position(29.5, 90.5) - waiting for source items, has coal fuel (4)
- Burner inserter at position(31.5, 91.5) - waiting for space in destination, has coal fuel (4)
The smelting area is operational with furnaces actively smelting iron ore into plates
